# Drone Attack on UN Peacekeeping Base in Sudan Kills Six

**Category:** world
**Generated (UTC):** 2025-12-15T05:55:10+00:00
**Published:** Dec 14, 2025
**Publisher:** UN News

## Summary
A deadly drone strike targeted a UN logistics base in Kadugli, Sudan, killing six peacekeepers and injuring eight from the Bangladeshi contingent in UNISFA. The UN has strongly condemned the attack amid escalating violence in the region. Fears of broader conflict continue to rise.
